Pre-Game Insights: Botswana's bid for an AFCON return kicked off on Saturday when they fell to a 1-0 defeat against Mauritania
Egypt turned in a superb team performance last Friday when they cruised to a 3-0 victory over Cape Verde
Others: Egypt hold a clear upper hand in the history of this fixture, having picked up four wins and one draw in the previous five encounters between the two nations
Botswana have failed to win eight of their nine games across all competitions in 2024, losing three and picking up five draws since the turn of the year
Egypt have lost just one of their last nine competitive away matches while picking up three wins and five draws since June 2022
